children.label: Headings
children.name: group_headings
children.inline_help_text: Titles or headlines that helps organize content. Changes here affect all headings on your site.

children.label: Body
children.name: group_body_font
children.inline_help_text: Main content following headings. Changes here affect all paragraphs on your site.

children.label: Other elements
children.name: group_other_elements
children.inline_help_text: Font styles for other elements used in your site such as tags, small captions, and more.

children.label: Block quote
children.name: group_block_quote
children.inline_help_text: Generally used to highlight quotes in testimonials

children.label: Caption
children.name: group_caption
children.inline_help_text: Generally used for very small and concise field labels

children.label: Colors
children.name: group_colors
children.inline_help_text: Changes to the palette affect all instances of the color on the site. More shades of these colors are created for you for a cohesive look across the theme.

children.label: Base colors
children.name: group_base_colors
children.help_text: These colors are generally used for backgrounds and text

children.label: Accent colors
children.name: group_accent_colors
children.help_text: These colors are generally used for buttons, icons, links, and more

children.label: Sections
children.name: group_sections
children.inline_help_text: Changes to colors here affect all instances of the background color on the site’s sections

children.label: Primary button
children.name: group_primary_button
children.inline_help_text: Used for the most important actions a visitor takes on the page. The color stands out and draws attention

children.label: Secondary button
children.name: group_secondary_button
children.inline_help_text: Used for relatively less important actions when there's already one primary button on the page.

children.label: Tertiary button
children.name: group_tertiary_button
children.inline_help_text: Another button style that may be used for actions a visitor takes on the page.

children.label: Accent button
children.name: group_accent_button
children.inline_help_text: Another button style that may be used for actions a visitor takes on the page.
